title: Edgardo González
text: Edgardo Nilson González (; 30 September 1936 - 26 October 2007) was a <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>an <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who played for <a href="Uruguay%20national%20football%20team">Uruguay</a> in the <a href="1962%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1962 FIFA World Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="C.A.%20Pe%C3%B1arol">C.A. Peñarol</a>.
